# Cuba Billie Jean King Cup team

The Cuba Billie Jean King Cup team represents Cuba in the Billie Jean King Cup tennis competition and are governed by the FederaciÃ³n Cubana de Tenis de Campo. They have not competed since 2010.
History
Cuba competed in its first Fed Cup in 1991.  Their best result was reaching the 32-team main draw in 1994.
